data.eml:eml: A new fairy shrimp Phallocryptus tserensodnomi (Branchiopoda: Anostraca) from Mongolia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alonso, Miguel, Ventura, Marc (2013): A new fairy shrimp Phallocryptus tserensodnomi (Branchiopoda: Anostraca) from Mongolia. Zootaxa 3670 (3): 349-361, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.3.5
